website_summaries.verdict: Quick-dry fabric upper makes this pair a great choice for trips to the pool or beach.
pros: Synthetic fabric upper, adjustable straps on forefoot and heel
Phylon midsole with Sensory Motion Technology
Comes in black-rush pink, hydrangeas-fire pink and tropical pink-bleached coral
cons: Fabric upper means the sandals tend to show dirt and signs of wear

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We bought this same sandal in a larger size because our child loved his previous (smaller size) ones so much last summer. They are so easy for him to put on himself, and they stay on well, unlike flip-flops. He actual wants to wear them all the time, but his school and summer childcare program requires tennis shoes on the playground for safety -- otherwise he would! These are also super easy to wash. My only wish would be for a white space to write his name (also required for school and childcare). They're all black everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Read Aloud

customer_reviews.title: Great for and very functional. Must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we ordered. The sandals are light weight so it’s easier for infants and toddlers to walk. The Velcro straps make putting on and taking off simple and quick. The material is high quality. The size was accurate. Great for all terrain including grass and sand. These are great sandals for all kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Saechao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shoes for our son age 5 yrs old. He has a wide foot. This fit him perfectly in width as well as length. They are so compfortable for him. They withstand the wear and tear that boys do on a daily basis. I normally don't pay this much for a shoe but we have gotten these in the past and they are awesome shoes to have to go anywhere in. They are sooo worth it !!! Update !! We have bought 1 size larger each year for 3 yrs. These shoes are so durable. Great for ruggedness or water park etc... Our son loves them. He says they are so comfortable. (8 yrs old).
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: These were too small and not wide at all for my sons feet.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I got for my toddler. It is very comfortable and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They hold up great and you can throw them in the washer
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these for my son for the last couple of years. They are adjustable and don't cut into his foot at all. They hold up great and you can throw them in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Cayden's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this shoe. My son only wore these less than 2 months (not every day) and they completely fell apart. Not happy since they are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are adjustable around the heel and the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair I’ve purchased. My son wore them every day for over a year before outgrowing then. I love that they are adjustable around the heel and the top of the foot so if you child had chubby or slim fit they adjust nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to slip on
customer_reviews.text: I have literally repurchased these 3x so far for my son since he was toddler. He LOVES them and so do I. They're easy to slip on, soft, water proof, great quality he loves running and jumping with them. They're comfy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ... these Nike Sunray shoes every summer they are the perfect summer sandal if your kids do not like flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: We buy my son a pair of these Nike Sunray shoes every summer they are the perfect summer sandal if your kids do not like flip-flops. They're also versatile so they can wear in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Luz

customer_reviews.title: Ordered large, Knew they ran small
customer_reviews.text: My son is barley in a one in every other brand/style of shoe. I ordered these a size up knowing that the size 1 he had in this style were really small. Size 2 fits as size 1 should!
customer_reviews.author: Space

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit.. Great product..my baby loves these so I had to boy 3..lol
customer_reviews.author: Dert

customer_reviews.title: comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these that I bought for my Grandson. Biggest appeal to these sandals other than comfort is that they are easy on / easy off. Fairly durable although most 5 year olds are pretty tough on footwear. The sole could be a bit thicker, particularly in the front. The velcro on the top held up pretty well but the material around it could be a bit more robust. It too some hand stitching work to make a repair. He loves them and would wear them all year if he could.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: not even close!
customer_reviews.text: order not avalible when it was supposed to be shipped upped it one size and now are huge for my 3 year old...
customer_reviews.author: lori aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Best Nike eve!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kids shoe. These work for everything and hold up great! My son out grew his first pair before they wore out and he wore them over two summers! He wears them on the beach and in the pool. And of course daily during summer. Best show ever. Worth the cost for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy them every year
customer_reviews.text: I buy these sandals for my grandsons every year. They look nice, wear well, and are easy to get off when they fall asleep in the car! They last the whole season and are even washable. Next year I will be buying 3 pairs! (another new grandson)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Schaller

product_meta.title: Nike 386518-011: Kids' Sunray Adjust 4 Sports Sandal (13 M US Little Kid)
product_meta.description: You always want the very best for your children. From the time they are born right up until the time they start making decisions on their own, you know that you want to offer them the finest that there is and to always be there for them. Strange as it might seem, the best shoes for their developing and growing feet will give them the best head start in this world that they deserve in order to successfully thrive. And that is where Nike shoes come into play. A Nike pair of sandals not only gives their little feet the start that they deserve, but will continue to play an important role with them as they grow. The specially designed manmade sole adds a degree of comfort and support that is unmatched with other brand names. Throw in the recognition for Nike in the industry for quality, style, and popularity and you come away with a pair of sandals for your child that will continue to gently ease them into their next stage in life. Nike shoes are a brand you can trust.
feature_bullets: Fashion Trend: Below Ankle Synthetic Sandal
